articles.title: Spokesman for Policy Department of NDC of DPRK Snubs Sophism of U.S. Secretary of State
articles.content:
Spokesman for Policy Department of NDC of DPRK Snubs Sophism of U.S. Secretary of State
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- U.S. Secretary of State Kerry on August 13 issued a "congratulatory statement". He extended "sincere congratulations" to the Korean nation greeting "the day of liberation" on behalf of President Obama and Americans.
					 Kerry was so shameless as to appear at a university seminar in Hawaii and claim that the U.S. has a "willingness to ease" the strained DPRK-U.S. relations.
					
					 At the recent ministerial meeting of the ASEAN Regional Forum he became vociferous that the U.S. was not interested in its hostile policy toward the DPRK and, if any, it was concerned for the improved bilateral relations.
					
					 A spokesman for the Policy Department of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK said in a statement on Wednesday in this regard:
					
					 For the Koreans August 15 is the day in which an end was put to the distress-torn history of more than 40 year-long Japanese imperialists' occupation. It is also the day when occupation of south Korea and shame and tragedy of national division began due to the U.S. imperialist aggressors.
					
					 However, Kerry "congratulated" the Koreans on this seven decade- long history of shame and tragedy. Can there be more unbearable mockery and insult to the Korean nation than this?
					
					 As already exposed, not content with inventing new moves for stifling the DPRK and sanctions against it, the U.S. is busy staging Ulji Freedom Guardian, the exercises for mounting a preemptive nuclear attack with huge aggression forces including nuclear war hardware involved. 
					
					 All of a sudden, these aggressors are waving olive branches with the veil of "protecting peace" in a bid to conceal their despicable true colors.
					
					 Kerry toured the U.S. mainland and Asian countries for just three days, donning masks of sheep and wolf bereft of any elementary face and etiquette, to say nothing of his position as diplomatic chief of the "super power". His behavior fully revealed once again the U.S. inveterate nature as a hypocrite who has deceived and mocked mankind with all sorts of gimmicks.
					
					 The DPRK is dynamically advancing full of dynamism, racing against time. This is winning the admiration of the whole world.
					
					 This is an exciting event that declares a total bankruptcy of the U.S. heinous hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. finds itself in a dilemma at present. If the U.S. attempts to make a head-on attack upon the DPRK, it is afraid of merciless retaliatory forces built by dint of Songun. It is not in a position to remain an onlooker to the reality, making a scream as a loser. 
					
					 The U.S. poor position reminds one of the Roman Empire which fell while seeking prosperity through aggression and war and was buried into oblivion.
					
					 The U.S. is running helter-skelter, with its future remaining gloomy.
					
					 What we would like to advice the U.S. once again is that it had better not waste its last energy while pursuing its hostile policy toward the DPRK which can never be implemented.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to stop playing the disgusting and cheap farce which can never work on anyone, properly understanding who its rival is.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Hungarian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Hungarian President
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, sent a message of greeting to Ader Janos, president of Hungary, on Wednesday on the occasion of its national day. 
					 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries will develop on good terms in the future, too, the message wished the Hungarian president and people successes in their work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Taean Friendship Glass Factory
articles.content:
Pak Pong Ju Makes Field Survey of Taean Friendship Glass Factory
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made a field survey of the Taean Friendship Glass Factory. 
					 Going round various shops of the factory modernly built thanks to the energetic guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, he learned about production of sheet glass of various sizes, heated reflex glass and hard glass, etc. and then held a consultative meeting.
					
					 The meeting emphasized the importance of the duty the factory is performing in increasing the local production of varieties of glassware and discussed the issues of pushing forward the project on an expansion basis.
					
					 It called upon the officials and workers of the factory to boost the production and thus positively contribute to accelerating the building of an economic power and improving the standard of people's living.
					
					 Prior to it, the premier went round the Jangsan Mine and discussed the ways of drastically increasing the production of fire-proof materials.

articles.title: National Sports Contest of Workers Opens
articles.content:
National Sports Contest of Workers Opens
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A national sports contest of workers opened with due ceremony at the Basketball Gymnasium in Chongchun Street on Wednesday in the run-up to the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 Participants in the contest, which will run through August 29 in various gymnasiums here, will compete in football, shooting, Taekwon-Do, hand-grenade throw and 400 m hurdle race.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, officials and members of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea (GFTUK) and players selected in provinces.
					
					 Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the Central Committee of the GFTUK, made an opening address to be followed by speeches.

articles.title: 4th Rason International Trade Exhibition Draws Attention of Businessmen
articles.content:
4th Rason International Trade Exhibition Draws Attention of Businessmen 
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The 4th Rason International Trade Exhibition is going on in Rason City, the economic and trade zone in the northeastern part of the DPRK. 
					 In this regard, KCNA had an interview with Kim Hyon Chol, deputy director of the Department of Economic Cooperation of the Rason City People's Committee. 
					
					 Kim said:
					
					 More than 100 local and foreign companies are taking part in the exhibition. The annual exhibition is intent on achieving the economic development common to the DPRK and other countries.
					
					 Through the exhibition, businessmen have been acquainted themselves with the development of the Special Economic Zone (SEZ). And they are having discussions on the possibilities of efficient trade while making import and export contracts.
					
					 The Rason City has been developed into an international region for relay transport, trade and investment, financial transactions and tourism.
					
					 The president of the Rason Noviymir Co. under the Russia-Far-east Investment Co. Ltd, told KCNA:
					
					 It is the third time for my company to take part in the exhibition. 
					
					 I have felt that progress has been made in every exhibition. And it has been well organized.
					
					 I hope that the exhibition will boost the cooperation between countries and regions. Especially, I want Russia and the DPRK to further develop the friendly cooperation in the fields of economy and trade.
					
					 My company is making investments in producing foodstuffs like sea foods and planning to expand their production and volume of export. I want many more Russians to participate in the exhibition. 
					
					 Willam Zhao, director of the UNAFORTE Ltd of Italy, said:
					
					 It is the first time for my company to attend the exhibition and it feels good.
					
					 The DPRK people's living standard and rate of consumption are high as evidenced by the fact that new goods are popular among them.
					
					 I was going to make an investment in the zone from a long ago and have invested in commercial buildings in the city. I hope that the economic trade zone would rapidly develop.

articles.title: Spanish Guest Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Spanish Guest Visits Mangyongdae 
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Manuel Garcia Botaya, chief of the Paektusan Group of Spain, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 He looked round the historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae, being briefed on the revolutionary life of the President. 
					
					 He went round the revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill. 
					
					 He also visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum, Songdowon International Children's Camp, Kim Man Yu Hospital and other places.

articles.title: New Software Conducive to Sports Development
articles.content:
New Software Conducive to Sports Development
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Sports Science Institute of the Academy of Sports Science in the DPRK has recently developed the motion analysis program based on dot-recognition of images.
					 In this regard, KCNA met Kang Chol Gyu, a section chief of the institute.
					
					 He said:
					
					 The program shows in dotted line every part of body on technical performance to find defects and improve accuracy. And it makes it possible to make a detailed analysis of physical, technical and tactical indexes of relevant teams.
					
					 The program has been proved effective after its introduction in different sporting events of the National Sport Team.
					
					 It was highly appreciated at the 29th National Festival of Science and Technology.

articles.title: Soccer Tournament for Torch Cup Goes on in DPRK
articles.content:
Soccer Tournament for Torch Cup Goes on in DPRK
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Group league matches for the Soccer Tournament for Torch Cup go on at Kim Il Sung Stadium here.
					 Thirteen teams from across the country are taking part in the tournament, divided into groups A and B. The tournament began on August 10 with the Youth Day (Aug. 28) as an occasion and will last till August 28.
					
					 The results of group league matches till August 18 showed that the April 25 Team was leading group A (seven teams) with four wins in four matches and Sobaeksu and Pyongyang teams group B (six teams), each with two wins and two draws in four matches.
					
					 The April 25 Team beat Amnokgang Team 4:1, the Team of the Ministry of Light Industry 3:1 and Ryongaksan and Kwanmobong teams 3:0.
					
					 It is certain that the April 25 Team will advance into the semifinals, according to an official concerned.
					
					 The group league matches will end on Aug. 22 and the semifinals will take place on a knock-out basis on Aug. 25. The finals are to be held on Aug. 28.

articles.title: DPRK Scientists, Technicians Strive for Improvement of People's Livelihood
articles.content:
DPRK Scientists, Technicians Strive for Improvement of People's Livelihood
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Scientists and technicians of the DPRK have worked hard for the improvement of people's living standard.
					 A technology for producing silicon potash fertilizer with locally-available raw materials was introduced to co-op farms.
					
					 At local building-materials factories, raw material feeding process was put on an automation basis and quality of cement considerably improved.
					
					 Additives for raising combustion efficiency of fault coal were developed for production of briquette.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex has pushed ahead with the research to introduce new technology of firing.
					
					 Technicians of the Guidance Bureau of Passenger Service in Pyongyang concentrated their efforts on solving the technical problems to improve the quality of SR transmission gear for a new-type trolley bus.
					
					 Teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University established an aid system to control the water level of the Taedong River while intensifying researches to put the production and supply of drinking water on a scientific basis.
					
					 Kim Chaek University of Technology has striven to develop the technology for producing ferroalloy with domestic raw materials.
					
					 Pyongyang University of Architecture and Pyongyang Han Tok Su University of Light Industry are concentrating efforts on the development and introduction of new building method and light industrial products.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Describes S. Korean Foreign Minister as U.S. Colonial Lackey
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Describes S. Korean Foreign Minister as U.S. Colonial Lackey
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, is behaving recklessly, forgetful of his wretched position. He is going busy to implore foreign forces to cooperate in the anti-DPRK campaign.
					 During the recent ASEAN Regional Forum he begged the U.S. and other countries to cooperate in the anti-DPRK campaign, describing the nuclear weapons and missiles of the DPRK as a "blatant challenge" to peace and stability, "urging the north to make a resolute decision to dismantle its nukes" and crying out for sending "a clearer and strong message to the north". When meeting with the secretary general of the Comprehensive Nuclear Test Ban Treaty on August 13, he again pulled up the DPRK over its "nuclear issue." 
					
					 Since he took office as minister of Foreign Affairs, he has slandered the DPRK, directing the focus of diplomacy to escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					 He has urged the DPRK to "dismantle its nukes" and malignantly slandered its line of developing the two fronts, claiming that "the north is increasing regional uneasiness by conducting nuclear tests and launching missiles and these are acts of threatening peace not only on the Korean peninsula but in the rest of Northeast Asia.
					
					 At a special academic forum he blustered that "the north counting on nuclear weapons is enveloped in darkness. He also talked rubbish that the "present uncertainty may emphatically tell that our aim is drawing near", vociferating about "instability and liquidity".
					
					 Nothing proper can be heard from the traitor. What he is uttering at home and abroad, not concealing his ulterior motive at a time when everything is going very bad at home, is only making the international position of south Korea more difficult. 
					
					 The south Korean puppet forces are having a hard time, jammed between the U.S. and neighboring countries over the frequent joint military exercises being staged in south Korea and the issue of establishing the U.S.-led missile defense system.
					
					 The U.S. kicked off together with the south Korean warmongers Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises targeting the north despite its repeated warnings and serious concern of the international community.
					
					 Pitiful, indeed, is the plight of Yun Pyong Se who is imploring foreign forces to cooperate in the anti-DPRK campaign, lost to shame, after  south Korea kicked off the war drills with foreign forces though it  is censured as a grave yard of human rights in the wake of the beating of private first class Yun to death.
					
					 Such quislings as Yun Pyong Se can never understand the DPRK's nuclear deterrence, the treasured sword for guaranteeing today and morrow of the nation and defending independence.
					
					 The situation on the Korean peninsula and the inter-Korean relations are being driven into the worst phase as now entirely due to the sycophantic and treacherous acts of the south Korean puppet forces getting hell-bent on the moves for confrontation with the DPRK in league with foreign forces.
					
					 If the puppet ruling forces refuse to roll back their treacherous policy with the backing of foreign forces, they can never get rid of the abyss of ruin.

articles.title: DPRK's Counteraction for Self-defence Will Be Put on Annual and Regular Basis: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK's Counteraction for Self-defence Will Be Put on Annual and Regular Basis: KCNA Commentary 
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- A touch-and-go situation is prevailing on the Korean peninsula owing to the U.S.-south Korea Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military drills. 
					 Huge armed forces and latest nuclear strike means involved in UFG are enough to fight a war. It may develop into a dangerous total war on the Korean peninsula. 
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK are following with the highest vigilance every move of the U.S. and south Korean puppet military gangsters to test the main programs of the "tailored deterrence strategy", the scenario for a preemptive nuclear strike at Pyongyang, the heart of the DPRK, and other strategic depths and important bases, during the drills for the first time in their history. 
					
					 UFG is now escalating the military confrontation and tensions on the Korean peninsula and further increasing the danger of a nuclear war than ever before. 
					
					 The war maniacs are terming the DPRK's counter-measures "threat" and "provocations," claiming that UFG is "annual and defensive one" in a bid to cover up its aggressive nature and danger. 
					
					 This is an unpardonable military provocation as it is seriously threatening the sovereignty and dignity of the DPRK and disturbing peace and stability on the peninsula. 
					
					 The DPRK stands for peace, pursuant to its domestic and foreign policies. 
					
					 Peaceful environment is very dear for the DPRK's development of economy and improvement of people's living standard. 
					
					 Tension on the peninsula is nothing helpful to the DPRK either. 
					
					 A series of military measures taken by the Korean People's Army including firing of tactical rockets are a legitimate exercise of its right to self-defence to cope with the U.S. nuclear threat and aggression which are driving the situation on the peninsula to the brink of a war and defend sovereignty of the country and security of the nation. 
					
					 No one can take issue with all the military actions to be taken by the DPRK as they are a legitimate exercise of the right to self-defence to cope with the military provocations, threats and anti-DPRK nuclear war hysteria of the U.S. and south Korean puppet war maniacs. 
					
					 Whoever hopes for peace and stability in the region and the rest of the world cannot but recognize the justice and inevitability of the DPRK's self-defence measures to protect the security of the country and the nation. 
					
					 As long as the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces persist in their aggressive joint military drills and nuclear blackmail, the DPRK will put its military counteractions on an annual and regular basis at an unpredictably higher stage. 
					
					 The DPRK will never remain a passive onlooker to the U.S. nuclear threat and blackmail.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Dependence on Outside Forces
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Slams S. Korean Authorities' Dependence on Outside Forces
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement reflecting the steadfast will to usher in a turning phase of improving the inter-Korean relations with August 15 as an occasion.
					 However, the south Korean puppet forces finally kicked off the joint military drills on Aug. 18, asserting that they would stage the Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises together with the U.S. as scheduled in defiance of the north's statement.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in an article terms this outright challenge to the DPRK's sincere efforts to terminate the tragedy of division through the national reconciliation, unity and reunification and pave a wide avenue of peace and prosperity.
					
					 The U.S. was the chief criminal who divided the Korean nation into the north and the south, the article says, adding:
					
					 Despite strong opposition and denunciation at home and abroad, the U.S. is instigating the south Korean authorities to stage frequent joint military exercises under the simulated conditions of invasion of the north. This is no more than an artifice to block the Koreans from having an opportunity of improving the inter-Korean relations and do harm to the north by pushing the situation on the Korean peninsula to an extreme phase of confrontation and tension.
					
					 It is as foolish an act as pulling the noose of subjugation around one's neck to try to solve the issue of the country's reunification, the matter of regaining the nation's sovereignty usurped by outside forces, by relying on outside forces 
					
					 It is necessary to drop the curtain on the U.S. domination and interference in internal affairs of Korea.
					
					 If the south Korean authorities truly want peace and detente on the Korean peninsula, they should oppose the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK, the root cause of the regional tension, and stop the farce of seeking anachronistic "cooperation with outside forces in the campaign to put pressure on the north". 
					
					 The withdrawal of the U.S. forces is the first step for putting an end to the U.S. domination and interference in internal affairs of south Korea. 
					
					 The south Korean people should intensify the anti-U.S. struggle to force the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the source of all sorts of misfortune and pain, to go back to their den.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Tradition of Victory over U.S.
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun on DPRK's Tradition of Victory over U.S. 
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Decades-long history of DPRK-U.S. standoff clearly proves that the victory is a proud tradition of the DPRK and the disgraceful setback is a tradition of the U.S. These law-governed differing traditions will last in the days ahead. Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says this in an article. 
					 Neither false propaganda nor frantic campaign of pressure can alter these traditions, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 These traditions originate from the Korean War in the 1950s. 
					
					 The ruling quarters of the U.S. termed the Korean War "forgotten one". They did so not because the war was short in its period and small in its scale but because they felt very shameful for the U.S. miserable defeat when looking back on the war. 
					
					 Since the ceasefire the DPRK has always emerged victorious in the standoff with the U.S. and the U.S. has always sustained successive defeats. 
					
					 Many U.S. administrations have been replaced by new ones from Truman's to Obama's. However, the U.S. hostile policy towards the DPRK has remained unchanged. 
					
					 In order to cope with the ever-escalating U.S. nuclear threats, the DPRK was compelled to conduct three nuclear tests. It thus proudly ranked itself among nuclear weapons states. It also emerged a satellite manufacturer and launcher. 
					
					 The hostile policy toward the DPRK pursued by the U.S. depending on nuclear weapons went totally bust due to its access to nukes. 
					
					 The U.S. goes mad to ignite a new war through a nuclear campaign in collusion with south Korean puppet forces. But it will bring it nothing but a final ruin. 
					
					 The world will clearly witness a miserable end of the U.S. in the future.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Accuses Regime of Staging Deceptive Farce over Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Accuses Regime of Staging Deceptive Farce over Ferry Sewol Disaster 
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- South Korean internet paper Voice of Voice in an editorial on August 14 denounced the deceptive farce staged by the south Korean puppet ruling quarters over the ferry Sewol disaster. 
					 The editorial said that the "Saenuri Party" on August 13 made a deceptive farce to clarify the ceaseless suspicion about where the present chief executive was and what she did for seven hours on the very day the ferry disaster occurred. 
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The "Saenuri Party" claimed that the chief executive issued appropriate instructions after receiving 21 reports about the ferry sinking at Chongwadae and it is necessary to put an end to the argument about her whereabouts. This is, in a word, an irrelevant answer. 
					
					 The ruling party's explanation of the chief executive's whereabouts and counter-measures taken on the very day of the disaster which drew strong public suspicion is nothing but a poor trick to bar the Presidential chief of staff and others from appearing at the hearing over the ferry Sewol disaster. 
					
					 Until when will the ruling quarters hold out this way? The "president" will only feel shame as she fails to properly clarify the matter.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Quarters Accused of Depending on Foreign Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Quarters Accused of Depending on Foreign Forces
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Minjok Thongsin, an internet paper of Koreans in the U.S., on August 15 carried an article denouncing the south Korean puppet ruling quarters for their policy of depending on foreign forces.
					 69 years have passed since the August 15 liberation but everything in the southern part of the Korean peninsula is totally subjugated by the U.S. imperialists as it is not yet free from their colonial rule, the article deplored.
					
					 The south Korean conservative forces are working with bloodshot eyes to bar the Korean nation from advancing along the road of independence, peaceful reunification and great national unity with its own efforts under the banner of the north-south joint declarations, it charged.
					
					 It condemned the conservative forces for leaving no stone untried to hurt the fellow countrymen in the north with nuclear weapons, desperately refusing to take over the right to command the wartime operation.
					
					 It accused the chief executive of not setting forth practical measures such as abolition of the "Security Law" though she talked about joint work between the south and the north.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Denounce UFG
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Denounce UFG
 Tokyo, August 19 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) issued statement on Tuesday denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers for kicking off the frantic Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises.
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, said UFG is, in fact, a declaration of a nuclear war to which the "tailored deterrence strategy" the keynote of which is to mount a preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK any moment will be applied.
					
					 He demanded the U.S. and south Korean authorities lend an ear to the warnings of the DPRK and stop at once the criminal nuclear war ruckus.
					
					 Ri Chong Gyong, director general of the Standing Council of the Korean Sportsmen's Federation in Japan, said the U.S. and puppet warmongers should clearly understand that the DPRK does not want a war but is never afraid of it and the DPRK is the military power led by the peerless great man of Mt. Paektu, and halt the reckless racket for aggression at once.
					
					 He noted that all Korean sports persons in Japan and sports fans would turn out in the nationwide movement to defend the peace of the country and open an epochal phase of national reunification.

articles.title: Chongryon Official Condemns UFG
articles.content:
Chongryon Official Condemns UFG
 Tokyo, August 19 (KNS-KCNA) -- Kang Chu Ryon, vice-chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) and chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, on Tuesday issued a statement denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers for kicking off the dangerous north-targeted Ulji Freedom Guardian joint war exercises.
					 The statement said that the war maneuvers fully revealed before the world the moves of the U.S. imperialists to permanently occupy south Korea and the treacherous acts of the south Korean puppet authorities.
					
					 It urged the U.S. imperialist aggressors to stop at once the north-targeted war maneuvers and get out of south Korea.
					
					 It also demanded the south Korean authorities and warmongers halt the moves for confrontation with the north and the war moves for igniting the north and opt for national reunification.
					
					 It said: We will turn out as one in the reunification movement under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un in order to carry out the proposals for peaceful reunification set forth by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and bring the happy future of the children to the reunified country.

articles.title: UFG Censured by General Association of Koreans in China
articles.content:
UFG Censured by General Association of Koreans in China
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China made public a statement on Monday denouncing the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet warmongers for kicking off the frantic Ulji Freedom Guardian joint military exercises targeting the north.
					 The statement said that the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces kicked off UFG, declaring a war against the DPRK.
					
					 In this regard the spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army declared in a statement that the most powerful and advanced preemptive strike will start mercilessly any moment, the statement said, fully supporting it.
					
					 It urged the U.S. and south Korean authorities to bear in mind the warning of the DPRK and stop UGF at once.
					
					 It said that sure is the final victory of the Korean people advancing under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, the illustrious commander of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Koreans in U.S. Call for Probing Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
articles.content:
Koreans in U.S. Call for Probing Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- Koreans in the U.S. staged a demo in New York on August 17 demanding the institution of a special law on probing the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster.
					 They urged the south Korean "government" to institute a special law on probing the truth about the disaster as demanded by the bereaved families and other people.
					
					 They said they would turn out in the action to institute the special law, sharing the intention with the bereaved families who had been out in a hunger strike till the truth behind the disaster will be probed.
					
					 Meanwhile, Koreans in the U.S. carried a full ad denouncing the puppet authorities for causing the disaster on the August 17 issue of New York Times.
					
					 They termed the ferry Sewol sinking disaster is the one caused by avarice, corruption and incompetence of the regime.
					
					 They called upon people from all walks of life to turn out in the signature campaign supporting the special law.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung's work "Let Us Achieve the Great Unity of Our Nation" was posted by the Swiss Group for the Study of the Juche Idea on its website on Aug. 7.
					 The work, published on August 1, Juche 80 (1991), says that the Korean nation is the driving force for national reunification, and indicates the tasks and ways for achieving the great unity of the whole nation.

articles.title: Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked in Guinea
articles.content:
Anniversary of Kim Jong Il's Start of Songun Revolutionary Leadership Marked in Guinea
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The Guinean National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a special bulletin on August 12 on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 The bulletin in an article titled "Undying exploits of Songun" said:
					
					 August 25, 1960 is the day when Kim Jong Il started his Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 The Songun revolutionary leadership provided by him ushered in a new era of prosperity unprecedented in the history of the Korean nation spanning five thousand years.
					
					 Under his command the Korean People's Army grew to be invincible army and the military muscle of the DPRK reached the highest level.
					
					 In an article titled "Day of Songun in the DPRK" the bulletin noted that the Day of Songun was instituted in the DPRK to convey to posterity the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Il, eternal chairman of the National Defence Commission.
					
					 The exploits he performed by laying a solid foundation for the ever-lasting prosperity of the country and nation with his outstanding and tested leadership will shine long along with the Day of Songun in the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked by South African Organization
articles.content:
Anniversary of Korea's Liberation Marked by South African Organization
 Pyongyang, August 20 (KCNA) -- The South African Group for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism on August 12 posted on its website articles including one titled "Korea's liberation, turning point of history" on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The articles said:
					
					 August 15, 1945 is the day of liberation when the Korean people could enjoy an independent and dignified life as full-fledged masters of their destiny, freed from the colonial slavery by the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung led the 15 year-long anti-Japanese armed struggle to victory and achieved the historic cause of the country's liberation, making the Korean people fully enjoy an independent and creative life as genuine masters of the state and society.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into a country centred on the popular masses, a socialist state independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in national defence, unfazed by any storm and an invincible power under the banner of the Juche idea and the Songun idea founded by the President and developed in depth by Kim Jong Il, chairman of the National Defence Commission.
					
					 In the DPRK all people are free to take part in political activities and the rights to press, publication, assembly and religion are guaranteed by law.
					
					 Everybody regards it as his or her due right to be provided with a stable life from the state after his or her birth and all members of the society are fully guaranteed all rights including the right to work and rest and the right to receive free education and free healthcare.
					
					 Human rights are fully provided in the DPRK as it is taking the Juche idea as its guiding idea.
					
					 It is quite natural that human rights are guaranteed on the highest level in the country guided by the Juche idea.

articles.title: Departamento de Politica de CDN rechaza sofisteria de Kerry
articles.content:
Departamento de Politica de CDN rechaza sofisteria de Kerry
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ACNC) -- El pasado dia 13, el secretario de Estado de Estados Unidos, Kerry publico una "declaracion de felicitacion" en representacion del presidente Obama y los habitantes estadounidenses.
					En su "declaracion" Kerry expreso las "felicitaciones sinceras" a la nacion coreana que acoge el dia de liberacion del pais. 
					
					En un seminario recien efectuado en la Universidad de Hawai, el dijo cinicamente que EE.UU. tiene la "voluntad de aliviar" las empeoradas relaciones con la RPDC. Y en la reciente reunion ministerial del Foro de AEAN disparateo que su pais no tiene interes en la politica hostil a la RPDC sino en la mejora de las relaciones bilaterales. 
					
					Al respecto, el portavoz del Departamento de Politica del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 20 una declaracion. 
					
					Para la nacion coreana el 15 de agosto es el historico dia que dio el punto final a los martirios de mas de 40 anos causados por la ocupacion del imperialismo japones, y al mismo tiempo, el dia de inicio de la ocupacion del Sur de Corea, la verguenza y tragedia de la division nacional por parte de los invasores norteamericanos, revela la nota y continua:
					
					Como ya fue revelado, ahora EE.UU., insatisfecho con la invencion de nueva campana y sancion anti-RPDC, libra los ejercicios de ataque preventivo nuclear Ulji Freedom Guardian movilizando enormes fuerzas armadas agresoras incluso los armamentos mortiferos nucleares. 
					
					Sin embargo, el imperio norteamericano oculta su verdadera intencion con la mascara de "defensa de la paz".
					
					En unos tres dias mas o menos, Kerry desempeno asi el doble papel de carnero y lobo en el territorio estadounidense y los paises asiaticos sin tener el prestigio de caudillo de diplomacia de la "superpotencia" ni la obligacion moral del ser humano. 
					
					La conducta de Kerry demuestra de nuevo la naturaleza hipocrita de EE.UU. acostumbrado a enganar a la humanidad con las intrigas de toda indole. 
					
					Ahora el aspecto prestigioso de la RPDC, que logra saltos vertiginosos acortando el tiempo, conmueve a todo el mundo y declara el fracaso total a la brutal politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC. 
					
					EE.UU. se encuentra en el dilema porque teme por una parte la venganza indiscriminada de la RPDC consolidada mediante el Songun y por la otra, no puede sufrir la derrota sin decir nada. 
					
					Este proceder miserable hace recordar a la antigua Roma extinguida por haber codiciado la prosperidad perpetrando la agresion y la guerra. 
					
					Volvemos a advertir a EE.UU. que no malgaste hasta sus ultimos esfuerzos recurriendo a la campana hostil a la RPDC nunca realizable aunque pasen miles y miles de anos. 
					
					EE.UU. debe conocer bien a su contraparte y dejar la mascarada asquerosa y pueril.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente hungaro
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam felicita al presidente hungaro 
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ACNC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio un mensaje de felicitacion al presidente de la Republica de Hungria, Ader Janos, con motivo del dia nacional de ese pais europeo. 
					Convencido de que en el futuro tambien seguiran desarrollandose favorablemente las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises, el remitente desea al destinatario y a su pueblo exitos en el trabajo para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Iniciada Competencia Deportiva Nacional de Obreros por Dia del Songun
articles.content:
Iniciada Competencia Deportiva Nacional de Obreros por Dia del Songun
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 54o aniversario del inicio de la direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il sobre la revolucion mediante el Songun, quedo inaugurada la Competencia Deportiva Nacional de Obreros.
					En el marco del certamen que tendra lugar hasta el dia 29 se realizaran las competencias de futbol, el tiro, el taekwondo, el lanzamiento de granada de mano y la carrera de obstaculos de 400 metros. 
					
					La ceremonia de apertura tuvo lugar este miercoles en el Centro de Baloncesto de la capitalina Avenida Chongchun con la participacion del secretario del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Choe Ryong Hae, el vicepremier Kim Yong Jin, los funcionarios y miembros de la Federacion General de los Sindicatos de Corea (FGSC) y los jugadores seleccionados de todas las provincias. 
					
					El presidente del Comite Central de la FGSC, Hyon Sang Ju pronuncio la palabra de apertura y otros funcionarios hicieron uso de la palabra.

articles.title: 4a Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason
articles.content:
4a Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason
Pyongyang, 20 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tiene lugar en la ciudad de Rason, zona economica y comercial septentrional de Corea, la 4a Exposicion Internacional de Mercancias de Rason.
					  El subjefe de la direccion de cooperacion economica del Comite Popular de la ciudad de Rason, Kim Hyon Chol, citado por la ACNC, dijo que en la presente exhibicion participan mas de 100 unidades provenientes de la RPDC y varios paises y prosiguio:
					
					  La exposicion que se realiza cada ano tiene el objetivo de llevar el desarrollo economico y prosperidad comunes de la RPDC y varios paises y regiones.
					
					En ese periodo los empresarios extranjeros presencian personalmente el estado del desarrollo en la zona economica especial en que se aplica la politica preferente en la rama economica y discuten la posibilidad de las transacciones comerciales eficaces y conciertan el contrato de exportacion de mercancias a traves del contacto mutuo.
					
					En la ciudad de Rason que se convierte en la zona del transporte intermediario internacional, comercio e inversion, circulacion monetaria, turismo y servicio, esta preparado el ambiente favorable  que permite realizar suficientemente la produccion y el comercio.
					
					El presidente de la Compania Rason Noviymir de la Compania Limitada de Inversiones del Lejano Oriente de Rusia dijo sobre su impresion como sigue:
					
					Yo participo en la cita por tercera vez.
					
					Cada vez que participo en la exhibicion puedo experimentar el desarrollo. La exposicion ha  sido organizada bien.
					
					Espero que se profundice la cooperacion entre los paises y regiones a traves de la exhibicion.
					
					Especialmente deseo que se fomenten mas la amistad y la cooperacion entre Rusia y Corea y se desarrollen activamente las relaciones economicas y comerciales.
					
					Mi compania invierte en la produccion de varios alimentos incluyendo el procesamiento de productos maritimos en la ciudad de Rason.
					
					En futuro quiero ampliar la produccion y la exportacion.
					
					Willam Zhao, director de la Compania Limitada UNAFORTE de Italia dijo que el mismo participo por primera vez en la exposicion, pero pudo sentir que el ambiente es bueno y continuo:
					
					Es alto el nivel de vida y consumo de los habitantes. 
					
					Lo muestran las nuevas mercancias que ganan buena reputacion por los moradores. 
					
					Ya hice inversion a los edificios comerciales, etc. en Rason. Desde hace mucho tiempo tenia la opinion de invertir aqui.
					
					Deseo que se desarrolle rapidamente la zona economica y comercial tan buena.
